reviewText: Donato Giancola is one of the top fantasy illustrators today and in this very imformative dvd shows how he does it. This dvd is very thorough in showing Donato's thought process and technique in creating a picture. Anyone wether they're a beginner or a professional at doing art will learn a lot from it. Donato is a very giving person and it's amazing how open he is to not holding back any secrets to the method that has taken many many years of hard work for him to develop. Illustartion is a very competitive field so Donato deserves much appreciation for showing us his process to his great work.
